title: Man shoots himself in hip, New Orleans police say
content:
A man shot himself in the hip early Monday (Oct. 31) in Algiers, according to the New Orleans Police Department.
NOPD said the shooting was reported before 4:30 a.m. in the 200 block of Newton Street. The man was treated at a hospital and released by 7 a.m. Authorities initially said he was shot by someone else, but during questioning, police said they learned the injury was self-inflicted. It wasn't immediately clear if the shooting was accidental.
No more details were immediately available.
Four people were killed and 13 wounded in a violent week in metro New Orleans that ended with a rash of armed robberies during the weekend, authorities said.
